update tasks
task_name = #{taskName},
task_content = #{taskContent},
task_progress = #{taskProgress},
task_feedback = #{taskFeedback},
create_date = #{createDate},
expiry_date = #{expiryDate},
publish_user_id = #{publishUserId},
work_user_id = #{workUserId},
where task_id = #{taskId}
mapper.select: select pt.task_id as task_id, task_name, task_content, create_date, expiry_date, task_progress, publish_user_id, work_user_id, task_state, task_feedback, task_status, task_type from tasks inner join project_task pt on tasks.task_id = pt.task_id

select pt.task_id as task_id, task_name, task_content, create_date, expiry_date, task_progress, publish_user_id, work_user_id, task_state, task_feedback, task_status, task_type from tasks inner join project_task pt on tasks.task_id = pt.task_id where publish_user_id = #{userId} or work_user_id = #{userId}

select pt.task_id as task_id, task_name, task_content, create_date, expiry_date, task_progress, publish_user_id, work_user_id, task_state, task_feedback, task_status, task_type from tasks inner join project_task pt on tasks.task_id = pt.task_id where project_id = (select project_id from projects where team_id = #{teamId})

select pt.task_id as task_id, task_name, task_content, create_date, expiry_date, task_progress, publish_user_id, work_user_id, task_state, task_feedback, task_status, task_type from tasks inner join project_task pt on tasks.task_id = pt.task_id where project_id = #{projectId}
